description: Verify that the cybersecurity levels page loads correctly with proper authentication and displays all level information
scenario: User navigates to the levels page to view available cybersecurity training levels
expected_results: Display the levels overview page with header, progress section, and all cybersecurity levels in a grid layout
procedure:
1. Log in as authenticated user
2. Navigate to /levels
3. Verify page loads with title 'Cybersecurity Levels'
4. Check subtitle about mastering cybersecurity through gamified challenges
5. Verify all main sections are present: header, progress overview, and levels grid

description: Verify that unauthenticated users are redirected to login when accessing levels page
scenario: Unauthenticated user attempts to access the levels page directly
expected_results: User should be redirected to login page due to @login_required decorator
procedure:
1. Ensure user is not logged in
2. Navigate directly to /levels
3. Verify redirect to login page
4. Check that levels content is not accessible without authentication
5. Login and verify successful access to levels page

description: Verify complete cybersecurity levels workflow from initial access through full progression
scenario: User completes entire cybersecurity training progression from first level to final master level
expected_results: Complete workflow provides engaging, progressive cybersecurity training experience with proper tracking and unlocking
procedure:
1. Access levels page as authenticated user
2. Review all available level information and metadata
3. Start with Level 1 'The Misinformation Maze'
4. Complete Level 1 and verify Level 2 unlocks
5. Progress through Level 2 'Shadow in the Inbox'
6. Continue progression through Level 3 'Malware Mayhem'
7. Advance to Level 4 'The White Hat Test'
8. Complete final Level 5 'The Hunt for The Null'
9. Verify final completion state with all levels completed
10. Check total XP accumulation (1,300 XP total)
11. Confirm progress shows 100% completion
12. Test replay functionality on completed levels
13. Verify complete training progression provides comprehensive cybersecurity education covering information literacy, email security, threat detection, ethical hacking, and digital forensics skills

description: Verify the page header displays correct title and description with proper styling
scenario: User views the levels page header to understand the purpose and context
expected_results: Display header with gradient title 'Cybersecurity Levels' and descriptive subtitle with fade-in animation
procedure:
1. Navigate to levels page
2. Check title shows 'Cybersecurity' with gradient-colored 'Levels' text
3. Verify subtitle mentions gamified challenges and skill advancement
4. Confirm proper styling with text centering and animations
5. Check fade-in-up animation effect on header

description: Verify the levels are displayed in a responsive grid layout with proper card structure
scenario: User views the levels grid to see all available cybersecurity training levels
expected_results: Display 5 level cards in responsive grid layout (3 columns on large screens, 2 on medium, 1 on small)
procedure:
1. Check levels are displayed in grid layout
2. Verify responsive behavior: 3 columns (lg), 2 columns (md), 1 column (mobile)
3. Confirm each level card has proper structure and spacing
4. Check fade-in animations with staggered delays
5. Verify card hover effects and transitions
6. Test grid layout on different screen sizes
